lead_paragraph: The airline will help to promote New York across the country and contribute $3.5 million to the city’s tourism agency.
snippet: The airline will help to promote New York across the country and contribute $3.5 million to the city’s tourism agency.

headline.main: New York and Airline to Team Up on Tourism
headline.seo: American Airlines to Sponsor New York City
headline.print_headline: American Airlines Teams Up With the City to Draw Tourism
